title: Capessa Identity
content:
Anyone recognize the typeface being used in Yahoo! Inc’s Capessa identity?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911200723im_/http:/typophile.com/files/capessa_6299.png)

 [‹ State Street Bread Co.](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911200723/http:/typophile.com/node/30545 "Go to previous forum topic") [Customised Sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911200723/http:/typophile.com/node/30541 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kensoliva

comments.content:
Maybe a mix of House Chalet 60 and 70 letters.

- Mike Yanega
